About me

I am currently a Master’s student at Columbia University, major in Electrical Engineering. Prior to it, I have completed my Master’s degree in Biomedical Engineering at University of Oxford in 2014 and my Bechelor’s degree in Electronics and Electrical Engineering at University of Liverpool in 2013. Please check out my LinkedIn page for more detials.
